Title: Rock My Heart
Writer: Clemente Fernandez-Gil (screenplay), Hanno Olderdissen (collaboration on screenplay), Clemente Fernandez-Gil (story), Hanno Olderdissen (story)
Actors: Emilio Sakraya, Lena Klenke, Anneke Kim Sarnau, Dieter Hallervorden
Plot: 17-year-old Jana has a congenital heart defect. To defy fate, Jana seeks every challenge, plunges into every wild and dangerous adventure. Her parents does not like that and are even more in constant fear of their daughter.
